Sentece: After the addition of minoxidil to the antihypertensive regimen of 7 hypertensive patients, the aldosterone metabolic clearance rate increased from 1,110 +/- 91 to 1,570 +/- 180 liters/day (p less than 0.01), an overall increase of 41%.
Title: Increased aldosterone metabolic clearance in hypertensive patients treated with minoxidil: an effect of greater hepatic perfusion.
Name: Minoxidil
